courseDetails.shortDescription: Executive Diploma of Vice President of Operations / Chief Operating Officer by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Executive Diploma of Vice President of Operations / Chief Operating Officer by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


The Vice President of Operations (VP of Operations) or Chief Operating Officer (COO) is a key executive position within a company responsible for overseeing the day-to-day operations and ensuring that business goals are met efficiently and effectively. The specific duties and job description may vary depending on the organization's size, industry, and structure, but generally include the following:

  1. Strategic Planning: The VP of Operations/COO works closely with the CEO and other executives to develop and implement strategic plans that align with the company's overall objectives. They often play a crucial role in translating high-level strategic goals into actionable plans for the operational teams.

  2. Operational Oversight: They are responsible for overseeing all operational aspects of the business, including production, manufacturing, supply chain management, distribution, and quality control. They ensure that operations run smoothly, efficiently, and cost-effectively to meet customer demands and achieve organizational targets.

  3. Process Improvement: Continuous improvement is a key aspect of the VP of Operations/COO role. They identify areas for improvement within operational processes and workflows, implement best practices, and drive initiatives to enhance efficiency, productivity, and quality.

  4. Resource Management: This involves managing resources such as human capital, equipment, and finances effectively to optimize operational performance. They may be involved in workforce planning, budgeting, and resource allocation to ensure that resources are utilized efficiently and in alignment with business objectives.

  5. Risk Management and Compliance: The VP of Operations/COO is responsible for identifying potential risks to operations and developing strategies to mitigate them. They also ensure that the company complies with relevant regulations and industry standards, maintaining a focus on operational excellence and risk mitigation.

  6. Cross-Functional Collaboration: They collaborate closely with other functional areas such as marketing, sales, finance, and technology to ensure alignment and integration of operations with overall business strategy. Effective communication and collaboration with other departments are essential for achieving organizational goals.

  7. Leadership and Team Management: The VP of Operations/COO provides leadership and direction to the operational teams, fostering a culture of excellence, accountability, and continuous improvement. They may recruit, develop, and mentor team members to build a high-performing and motivated workforce.

  8. Performance Monitoring and Reporting: They monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to assess operational performance and identify areas for improvement. Regular reporting to senior management and stakeholders on operational performance, challenges, and opportunities is typically part of the role.

Overall, the VP of Operations/COO plays a critical role in driving operational excellence, ensuring that the company's operations are aligned with its strategic goals, and contributing to overall business success.


Learning about operations management is crucial for companies and managers for several reasons:


Efficiency and Cost Reduction: Operations management principles help companies streamline processes, optimize resource utilization, and minimize waste, resulting in improved efficiency and cost reduction. Managers who understand operations management can identify inefficiencies and implement strategies to enhance productivity and reduce operational expenses, thereby increasing profitability.


Quality Improvement: Operations management encompasses techniques for quality control and assurance, ensuring that products and services meet or exceed customer expectations. Managers with expertise in operations management can implement quality management systems, establish quality standards, and drive continuous improvement initiatives to enhance product/service quality and customer satisfaction.


Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: Effective operations management contributes to delivering products and services to customers in a timely manner and meeting their expectations regarding quality and reliability. Satisfied customers are more likely to become repeat customers and advocates for the company, leading to increased customer loyalty and positive word-of-mouth referrals.


Competitive Advantage: Operations management plays a pivotal role in helping companies gain a competitive edge in the marketplace. By optimizing processes, reducing lead times, and enhancing product/service quality, companies can differentiate themselves from competitors and attract customers. Managers skilled in operations management can identify opportunities for innovation and process improvement to sustain a competitive advantage.


Adaptability and Resilience: In today's dynamic business environment, companies face various challenges such as changing customer demands, technological advancements, and market disruptions. Operations management equips managers with the knowledge and tools to adapt to changing circumstances, mitigate risks, and build resilience into the organization's operations.


Developing skills in operations management can support career advancement in several ways:


Career Opportunities: Proficiency in operations management opens up diverse career opportunities across industries and sectors. Roles such as operations manager, supply chain manager, production manager, and logistics manager are in high demand and offer avenues for career growth and advancement.


Leadership Development: Managing operations requires strong leadership skills, including communication, problem-solving, decision-making, and team management. Developing these skills through hands-on experience and training in operations management can prepare individuals for leadership roles within organizations.


Strategic Impact: Operations managers often play a strategic role in shaping organizational strategy and driving business performance. By understanding the link between operations and overall business objectives, individuals can contribute meaningfully to strategic decision-making and organizational success.


Continuous Learning and Improvement: Operations management is a dynamic field that continuously evolves with changing technologies, market trends, and best practices. Individuals who invest in developing their skills in operations management demonstrate a commitment to lifelong learning and professional development, positioning themselves as valuable assets to employers.


Job Satisfaction and Fulfillment: Successfully managing operations and driving improvements can be highly rewarding both professionally and personally. Seeing tangible results such as increased efficiency, cost savings, and customer satisfaction can enhance job satisfaction and fulfillment, motivating individuals to pursue further career advancement opportunities.


In summary, learning about operations management is important for companies and managers as it contributes to efficiency, quality, customer satisfaction, competitive advantage, and resilience. Developing skills in operations management supports career advancement by opening up opportunities, fostering leadership development, enabling strategic impact, promoting continuous learning, and enhancing job satisfaction.
targetAudiences: Course for any who want to build a career at management, business and entrepreneurship.

courseDetails.title: Mental Health for the Workplace
courseDetails.shortDescription: A Comprehensive Course on Practical Workplace Mental Health practices - aimed at everyone in the Workplace
courseDetails.longDescription:
Take Control of Workplace Mental Health – Enrol Today!


Mental health is no longer just a personal issue—it’s a workplace priority. In today’s fast-paced work environment, stress, burnout, and anxiety have become all too common, affecting employee well-being and overall productivity. But what if you had the tools to create a supportive and mentally healthy workplace?


Our "Mental Health for the Workplace" course is designed to help professionals at all levels understand the impact of mental health in the workplace and take actionable steps to foster a positive and resilient work culture. Whether you're a manager, HR professional, team leader, or employee looking to support your colleagues, this course equips you with practical strategies to build a mentally healthy environment.


What You’ll Gain from This Course:

  • Recognize the Signs of Mental Health Challenges – Identify early warning signs of stress, burnout, and emotional exhaustion.

  • Build a Culture of Support and Inclusion – Learn how to create a workplace where employees feel valued and heard.

  • Manage Stress and Prevent Burnout – Discover practical techniques to reduce stress and maintain well-being.

  • Encourage Open Conversations – Develop communication skills to support mental health discussions at work.

  • Implement Workplace Mental Health Policies – Understand best practices and compliance guidelines for mental health.

  • The numerous benefits of having a workplace with a healthy mental health environment.


By enrolling in this course, you’ll be taking a crucial step toward making your workplace healthier, happier, and more productive. Mental health is everyone’s responsibility, and together, we can create environments where people thrive.


We include practical steps that you can take away today, practice and adapt to get the outcomes you are looking for.


This course is highly recommended for HR Departments, Learning and Development Departments to use as a resource for their organisations.


We hope you find the tools and resources included in this course useful.


Please, let us know how you get on. 


Best regards,

Helen and Baba
targetAudiences: CFO's CEO's, COO's, HR and other Directors
Entrepreneurs building a supportive work culture

courseDetails.shortDescription: Executive Diploma of Vice President / Chief Innovation Officer by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Executive Diploma of Vice President / Chief Innovation Officer by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

Course contains 2 Modules: Corporate Entrepreneurship and Innovations Management


1. Management of innovations refers to the strategic planning, implementation, and oversight of processes and practices aimed at fostering innovation within an organization. It involves the systematic handling of new ideas, technologies, products, or processes from conception to implementation, with the goal of driving growth, competitiveness, and long-term success.

Key components of managing innovations include:

  1. Strategic Planning: Effective management of innovations begins with strategic planning that aligns innovation efforts with the overall goals and objectives of the organization. This involves identifying areas for innovation, setting clear objectives, and allocating resources strategically.

  2. Idea Generation and Screening: The management of innovations involves generating ideas for new products, services, or processes through brainstorming sessions, market research, or collaboration with stakeholders. These ideas are then screened and evaluated based on criteria such as feasibility, market potential, and alignment with organizational goals.

  3. Resource Allocation: Allocating resources, including financial, human, and technological resources, is a critical aspect of managing innovations. This involves making decisions about how to allocate resources effectively to support innovation initiatives while balancing competing priorities.

  4. Risk Management: Innovation inherently involves risks, including financial risks, technical risks, and market risks. Effective management of innovations requires identifying and assessing these risks and implementing strategies to mitigate them. This may involve conducting risk assessments, scenario planning, or developing contingency plans.

  5. Cross-functional Collaboration: Managing innovations often requires collaboration across different departments or functional areas within an organization. Cross-functional teams bring together diverse perspectives and expertise to tackle complex innovation challenges and drive implementation.

  6. Prototyping and Testing: Before bringing a new product or service to market, it's essential to prototype and test ideas to gather feedback and identify potential issues. The management of innovations involves overseeing the prototyping and testing process and using insights gained to refine and improve the innovation.

  7. Intellectual Property Management: Protecting intellectual property is crucial for organizations investing in innovation. This involves managing patents, trademarks, copyrights, and trade secrets to ensure that the organization can capitalize on its innovations and maintain a competitive advantage.

  8. Continuous Improvement: Innovation is an ongoing process that requires continuous learning and improvement. Effective management of innovations involves establishing mechanisms for gathering feedback, evaluating performance, and incorporating lessons learned to enhance future innovation efforts.

Overall, the management of innovations is about creating a supportive environment that fosters creativity, experimentation, and collaboration while also providing the structure and guidance needed to translate innovative ideas into tangible outcomes that drive organizational success.


Corporate entrepreneurship, also known as intrapreneurship, refers to the process of developing and implementing new ideas and innovations within an established organization. It involves fostering an entrepreneurial mindset and culture within the company to encourage employees to think creatively, take risks, and pursue opportunities for growth and innovation.

The main goal of corporate entrepreneurship is to drive organizational growth and competitiveness by leveraging internal resources and capabilities to develop new products, services, processes, or business models. By encouraging employees to think and act like entrepreneurs, companies can stay ahead of the curve, adapt to changing market conditions, and capitalize on emerging opportunities.

Learning about corporate entrepreneurship is important for companies and managers for several reasons:

  1. Innovation and Adaptability: Companies need to continuously innovate and adapt to stay relevant. By fostering a culture of entrepreneurship, organizations can tap into the creative potential of their employees to generate new ideas and solutions.

  2. Competitive Advantage: Corporate entrepreneurship can provide a significant competitive advantage by enabling companies to identify and capitalize on emerging market trends and opportunities before their competitors. It allows organizations to differentiate themselves in the market and create unique value propositions for their customers.

  3. Employee Engagement and Retention: Employees are more likely to be engaged and motivated when they feel empowered to contribute their ideas and make a meaningful impact on the organization. By promoting entrepreneurship, companies can attract and retain top talent who are eager to take on new challenges and drive innovation.

  4. Risk Management: Corporate entrepreneurship can help companies manage risk by encouraging experimentation and learning from failure in a controlled environment. By embracing a culture of innovation, organizations can identify potential risks and opportunities early on and develop strategies to mitigate them effectively.

Learning about corporate entrepreneurship can also support career development for managers and employees in several ways:

  1. Skill Development: By participating in corporate entrepreneurship initiatives, managers and employees can develop valuable skills such as creativity, problem-solving, and strategic thinking. These skills are highly sought after in today's competitive job market and can open up new career opportunities.

  2. Visibility and Recognition: Successfully leading or participating in corporate entrepreneurship projects can increase visibility and recognition within the organization. Managers and employees who demonstrate entrepreneurial behavior are often seen as valuable assets and may be considered for promotions or other career advancement opportunities.

  3. Networking and Collaboration: Corporate entrepreneurship often involves cross-functional collaboration and networking with colleagues from different parts of the organization. Engaging in these activities can help managers and employees build strong relationships and expand their professional networks, which can be beneficial for career growth and development.

Overall, learning about corporate entrepreneurship is essential for companies and managers looking to drive innovation, stay competitive, and create value in today's dynamic business environment. By fostering a culture of entrepreneurship and providing opportunities for learning and development, organizations can empower their employees to unleash their creative potential and drive long-term success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.shortDescription: FIDIC REDBOOK WITHOUT THE COMPLICATED LEGAL JARGON WITH REAL EXAMPLES AND IMPLICATIONS
courseDetails.longDescription:
Whether you’re a contractor, consultant, engineer, or project manager, understanding the FIDIC Red Book (2017 – 2nd Edition) is essential for navigating modern construction contracts. This clause-by-clause course will help you master the roles, responsibilities, rights, and remedies under the contract — with a practical, project-based approach.

THIS IS AN ONGOING COURSE WITH NEW LECTURES EVERY WEEK

Unlike legal theory courses, this class is built from real-world construction experience in high-value projects across the UAE, Saudi Arabia, and beyond. Every clause is explained in plain language with examples from live projects, claim scenarios, and site risks to show how the FIDIC Red Book applies on the ground.

What You’ll Learn:


  • Understand each clause of the FIDIC Red Book 2017 in detail

  • Learn how to avoid disputes and protect your contractual position

  • Interpret contract obligations for the Employer, Engineer, and Contractor

  • Handle subcontracting, site conditions, claims, and project delays

  • Navigate practical issues like safety, quality, and payment risks

  • Learn when and how to raise Notices, prepare claims, and trigger determinations


Who Should Take This Course?


  • Construction Project Managers & Site Engineers

  • Contract Administrators & Planning Engineers

  • Consultants, Architects, and Quantity Surveyors

  • Lawyers and legal professionals new to FIDIC

  • Anyone involved in FIDIC contract implementation


About the Instructor:

Ubair Riyaz is a seasoned Planning & Contracts Manager with 10+ years of experience in high-profile Middle East projects. He specializes in FIDIC-based contract administration, EOT claim preparation, and AI-driven workflows for construction teams.

Step two: target audience analysis. By completing this block, you will have a portrait of your target audience, including their demographics, and psychographic characteristics, as well as their needs and pain points, which will help you identify triggers that influence purchasing decisions.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPTとAI: 究極のAIトレーニング
courseDetails.shortDescription: AIを極めよう：ChatGPT、Dall-e、Claude、Gemini AIの完全ガイド
courseDetails.longDescription:
ChatGPTと生成AIの究極トレーニング:

毎日の頼れるパートナー、優れた個人アシスタントと共に新しい始まりの準備はできていますか？タスクを驚異的な精度とスピードでこなすAIが、あなたのメールや記事、レポートの作成から、インスピレーションあふれる画像の生成、複雑なデータの分析、カスタムソリューションのコーディング、様々な問題の解決までをサポートします。これにより、あなたは本当に重要なことに集中することができます。


AIのすべての恩恵を享受するためには、まずAIを使いこなす必要があります。多くの人々は最初は興味を持ち、2〜3回のプロンプトを試してみるだけで、AIの真の可能性を見いだすことなく興味を失ってしまいます。その背景には、最適な結果を得るための技術や方法、設定についての知識不足があることが多いです。

このトレーニングの目的は、AIと効果的にコミュニケーションを取り、最適に設定し、最大限に活用するためのすべての鍵を提供することです。


この目標を達成するために、私はコンパクトでダイナミックなカリキュラムを設計しました。このカリキュラムでは、AIの最適な利用法に必要な知識とスキルを習得できます。トレーニングでは以下のことを学びます：

  • AIに明確なリクエストを行い、最良の回答を得る方法

  • ChatGPTを信頼できる教師、共同創設者、アナリストに設定する方法

  • 多様なアイデアを生成し、仕事の質を向上させ、生産性を高め、より速く、より適切かつ効率的にする方法

  • ChatGPTのマルチモーダル機能を活用し、テキストや音声での対話、画像の送信と解釈を行う方法

  • Dall-eやCopilotを使って最良の画像を生成する方法

  • ChatGPTの有料版の代替案を見つける方法

  • Copilot、Claude、Geminiなど他のAIを探索する

  • ChatGPTを自分の好みや特定のニーズに合わせてカスタマイズし、個別の回答を得る方法

  • GPTsを利用してChatGPTを強化する方法：これらのアプリケーションの使い方や、開発者でなくても作成する方法

  • API管理、プレイグラウンド、ExcelやGoogle Sheetsなど他のソフトウェアとの統合など、少し技術的なトピックをトレーニングの最後に扱う

そして、これらすべてが初心者でもアクセス可能であることを確認します。


このトレーニングには以下が含まれます：

  • 実践的なデモンストレーション

  • ダウンロード可能な技術資料や実践ガイド

  • そして何より、定期的に更新されるコンテンツ


[更新情報：GPT4の次世代モデルであるGPT4oの使用に関する動画を追加しました]

要約すると、あなたは明確でアクセスしやすく、魅力的なコースを受講しようとしています。このコースは基本概念を網羅しながらも冗長ではなく、詳細な内容です。初心者から高度なテクニックを求める方まで、ChatGPTをマスターするために必要な唯一のトレーニングです。

自己紹介：

私はヤシン・ロシュドと申します。多くの学習者がプロフェッショナルな目標を達成するのを支援してきたトレーニング機関の創設者です。

私はテクノロジーに情熱を持っています。金融の修士号を取得し、コンサルティングや投資ファンドでの経験を経た後、ウェブ開発のトレーニングを受け、数百時間にわたってAIの発見と使用に取り組んできました。

今日は、過去数年間で学んだことをできるだけ分かりやすくお伝えしたいと思います。


認定と保証：

  • このトレーニングを修了すると、LinkedInでも共有できる認定証を受け取ることができます。

  • このトレーニングはリスクフリーで、30日間の「満足保証」付きです。

  • トレーニング、ダウンロード可能なリソース、将来の更新に生涯アクセスできます。

非常に役立つ技術をマスターし、より効率的で生産的になり、欠かせない存在になるための一歩が、今ここにあります。


コースの各セクションの詳細:


ChatGPTのクイックスタート

数本のビデオでChatGPTをすばやく習得する方法を学びます。直感的なインターフェイスに飛び込み、最初のプロンプトを作成してAIの力を最大限に活用しましょう。テーブルの生成、ブレインストーミング、アイデアの生成、テキストの翻訳と校正、さまざまなコンテンツの作成など、AIを使えば迅速かつ効果的に作業が進みます。ChatGPTがあなたの就職活動を支援し、プロフェッショナルなニーズに合わせて効率を高める方法を発見しましょう。メールや手紙から記事、ソーシャルメディアの投稿、プログラミングコードの作成まで、多様なコンテンツを生成する能力を持つChatGPTを活用する方法を学びます。


プロンプトエンジニアリングの基礎

なぜプロンプトエンジニアリングが重要なのか、その理由を学び、ChatGPTを真の専門家に変える方法を理解します。コンテキストと目標の重要性を理解し、インタラクションを構造化する方法、フォーマットと温度を調整してプロンプトを最適化し、モデルの創造性のレベルを変える方法を発見します。トーンとスタイルをマスターしてインタラクションをパーソナライズし、より適切な回答を得るための5つの実用的なヒントを提供します。


プロンプトエンジニアリングの高度な技術

このセクションでは、他のプロンプトを生成するプロンプトを作成する方法を学びます。リバースエンジニアリングの手法、ウェブ検索機能、画像の解釈など、さまざまな高度な技術を学びます。


Dall-e

Dall-eを使った画像生成について学びます。平均的な結果から美的でインスピレーションを与える作品に変える方法、画像の部分を簡単かつ迅速に修正する方法、結果を最適化する方法を学びます。フィクションや漫画のキャラクターの生成を連続性を持って行う技術など、高度なテクニックも学び、より印象的な結果を得る方法を学びます。


ChatGPTとAIの限界に対するソリューション

ChatGPTや他のAIモデルには限界や弱点があります。このセクションでは、それらが何であるか、そしてそれを克服する方法を学びます。


ChatGPTの興味深い機能

チャットの共有機能を設定してChatGPTを共同利用する方法を学びます。ChatGPTのモバイルアプリを最大限に活用し、そのすべてのオプションを探ります。最後に、AIを使用して独自のコンテンツを作成し、盗用や重複コンテンツを避ける方法を学びます。


CopilotとBing

CopilotはChatGPTの有料機能や高度な機能に対する興味深い代替案を提供します。MicrosoftとOpenAIの提携を活用して、Bing検索エンジンに統合された高度なAI機能にアクセスする方法を学びます。


Gemini、Claude、Mistral、その他

前のセクションに続き、GoogleのGeminiやAnthropicのClaudeなど、他のAIを調査します。それらの強みと弱みを理解し、ChatGPTよりも優先して使用するケーススタディを検討します。


ChatGPTのカスタム指示

ChatGPTをあなたのニーズや期待に合わせてカスタマイズする方法を学びます。カスタム指示を設定してインタラクションをパーソナライズし、最適な使用のために考慮すべき注意点を発見します。


GPTs

GPTsの仕組みを学びます。これらの専門的なミニアプリケーションは、時にはChatGPTを超えることがあります。ステップバイステップで独自のGPTを作成する方法を学びます。ChatGPTの能力を最大限に引き出すためのAPIコールをマスターし、最終的にはGPTを収益化する方法や、ChatGPTを活用してお金を稼ぐ方法も学びます。


API管理とプレイグラウンド

ChatGPTのプレイグラウンドを探索し、新機能を発見します。段階的に難易度を上げてChatGPTのAPIを呼び出す方法を学びます。これにより、ChatGPTをインターフェース外で使用したり、別のサイトにチャットボットを作成したり、Google SheetsやExcelなどの他のソフトウェアに統合したりすることができます。
targetAudiences: AIとChatGPTをマスターしたいすべての人に。このトレーニングはすべてのレベルに対応しています。

courseDetails.title: Modellazione finanziaria: corso completo di finanza su Excel
courseDetails.shortDescription: Studio di caso di modellazione finanziaria su Excel - Finanza, valutazione e modellazione finanziaria su Excel
courseDetails.longDescription:
Se siete interessati a carriere nel campo della finanza, come Private Equity, M&A, controllo finanziario o gestione finanziaria, avrete compreso che esiste un'abilità fondamentale da padroneggiare in tutti questi ambiti: la modellazione finanziaria.

Che stiate elaborando un business plan, un report finanziario, o conducendo una valutazione aziendale, questa competenza è indispensabile.

Questo corso completo sulla modellazione finanziaria in Excel vi doterà delle conoscenze, delle tecniche e delle migliori pratiche per sviluppare un modello su Excel chiaro e ben organizzato che risponda alle aspettative di banche d'investimento, fondi di Private Equity e squadre di gestione finanziaria.

Durante questa formazione, apprenderete gli standard di modellazione finanziaria e le regole da seguire per ottenere un esito professionale.

Imparerete a creare un modello finanziario dettagliato con vari scenari di investimento, un piano di indebitamento con diverse tranche di finanziamento e caratteristiche variabili, una chiara tabella di Fonti e Impieghi, un Business Plan professionale e un modello di valutazione aziendale basato su transazioni comparabili, impiegando un EBITDA normativo. Infine, calcoleremo il Tasso Interno di Ritorno (TIR) e lo adegueremo in base ai parametri di uscita dell'investimento.

Naturalmente, se non siete ancora a conoscenza di tutti questi concetti, ne chiariremo il significato prima di iniziare con la modellazione finanziaria su Excel.

Questo corso abbraccia i fondamenti essenziali della finanza, indispensabili da padroneggiare per chi è interessato al controllo finanziario, all'analisi finanziaria o alle carriere transazionali (PE, M&A, TS).
targetAudiences: Studenti di finanza interessati ai settori altamente competitivi della finanza aziendale come il Private Equity, il Venture Capital, M&A, il Leveraged Finance, l'ECM, i Transaction Services, la Ristrutturazione, la Valutazione e, naturalmente, la modellazione finanziaria.
Candidati per un colloquio in finanza che desiderano esercitarsi e prepararsi per casi di modellazione finanziaria basati su Excel.
Stagisti in finanza aziendale che vogliono migliorare le loro competenze in finanza, modellazione finanziaria ed Excel.
Analisti finanziari senior che desiderano migliorare le proprie competenze in modellazione finanziaria con Excel.

courseDetails.title: Senior Executive Business Management and Leadership Program
courseDetails.shortDescription: Senior Executive Business Management and Leadership Program by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Senior Executive Business Management and Leadership Program by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


Course contains 3 Modules:

1) Leadership

2) Business Management

3) CEO and C-Level Executive Practical course


Leadership: Leadership is the ability to inspire, influence, and guide individuals or groups towards a common goal or vision. It involves setting a clear direction, motivating others, making tough decisions, and fostering collaboration and innovation within an organization. Effective leaders possess qualities such as integrity, empathy, decisiveness, and strategic thinking. Leadership can be exhibited at various levels within an organization, from frontline supervisors to top executives.


Business Management: Business management refers to the process of planning, organizing, directing, and controlling resources (such as human, financial, and material) to achieve organizational objectives efficiently and effectively. It encompasses various functions such as strategic planning, operations management, marketing, finance, and human resources management. Business managers are responsible for overseeing day-to-day operations, ensuring that resources are utilized optimally, and adapting to changes in the business environment to sustain or improve organizational performance.


Importance of the Role of C-level Executive / CEO: The role of a C-level executive, particularly the Chief Executive Officer (CEO), is crucial in shaping the strategic direction and overall success of an organization. Some key aspects of their importance include:


Setting Vision and Strategy: The CEO is responsible for defining the organization's mission, vision, and long-term strategic goals. They provide a roadmap for the company's future direction and growth.

  • Decision Making: C-level executives make high-stakes decisions that impact the entire organization. They must analyze complex information, anticipate market trends, and weigh risks to make informed choices.

  • Leadership and Culture: CEOs set the tone for organizational culture and values. They inspire and motivate employees, instilling a sense of purpose and belonging within the workforce.

  • Stakeholder Relations: CEOs act as liaisons between the company and its stakeholders, including investors, customers, employees, and the community. They must maintain positive relationships and communicate effectively to build trust and credibility.

  • Accountability and Performance: Ultimately, CEOs are accountable for the company's performance and must deliver results to shareholders and other stakeholders. They are responsible for driving innovation, managing resources efficiently, and adapting to changes in the competitive landscape.

  • Risk Management: C-level executives must identify and mitigate risks that could threaten the organization's reputation, financial stability, or strategic objectives. They develop contingency plans and ensure compliance with legal and regulatory requirements.


Learning is paramount in both leadership and business management fields, benefiting both companies and individual managers in several ways:


Adaptation to Change:

Continuous learning equips managers with the knowledge and skills needed to adapt to market shifts, technological advancements, and evolving customer preferences. It enables them to stay ahead of the curve and lead their teams through transitions effectively.


Innovation and Problem-Solving:

Learning fosters creativity and critical thinking among managers, enabling them to devise innovative solutions to complex challenges. By staying abreast of industry trends and best practices, managers can identify opportunities for improvement and drive organizational innovation.


Enhanced Leadership Skills:

Effective leadership requires a diverse skill set, including communication, emotional intelligence, and conflict resolution. Ongoing learning helps managers hone these skills, enabling them to inspire and motivate their teams, build trust, and resolve conflicts constructively.


Strategic Decision Making:

Managers must make strategic decisions that align with the organization's goals and values. Learning provides them with the knowledge and analytical tools necessary to evaluate options, assess risks, and make informed decisions that drive sustainable business growth.


Employee Development and Engagement:

Investing in learning opportunities for managers demonstrates a commitment to employee development and engagement. Managers who prioritize learning set a positive example for their teams, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and personal growth within the organization.


Risk Management and Compliance:

Learning about regulatory requirements, industry standards, and emerging risks is essential for managers to ensure compliance and mitigate potential threats to the organization. By staying informed and proactive, managers can safeguard the company's reputation and financial stability.


Building Career Progression:

For individual managers, continuous learning is key to building a successful career. Acquiring new skills, obtaining certifications, and pursuing advanced degrees demonstrate commitment to professional development and increase opportunities for advancement within the organization. Moreover, learning opens doors to new career paths and enhances marketability in the job market.

Overall, learning is instrumental in driving organizational success and supporting career growth for managers. By fostering a culture of continuous learning and development, companies can cultivate a talented workforce equipped to tackle the challenges of today's dynamic business landscape.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Professional Diploma in Customer Relationship Management CRM by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Professional Diploma in Customer Relationship Management CRM by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


CRM stands for Customer Relationship Management. It refers to the strategies, technologies, and practices that companies use to manage and analyze customer interactions and data throughout the customer lifecycle, with the goal of improving customer service relationships and assisting in customer retention and sales growth.


Learning about CRM is important for companies and managers for several reasons:


Customer Satisfaction: CRM helps companies better understand their customers' needs, preferences, and behaviors. By analyzing customer data, companies can personalize their interactions, anticipate customer needs, and provide better service, leading to increased customer satisfaction and loyalty.


Sales and Marketing: CRM systems enable companies to track sales leads, manage marketing campaigns, and identify potential opportunities for cross-selling and upselling. By centralizing customer data and communication channels, CRM helps sales and marketing teams work more efficiently and effectively.


Data-Driven Decision Making: CRM provides valuable insights into customer trends, buying patterns, and sales performance. Managers can use this data to make informed decisions about product development, pricing strategies, and resource allocation.


Improved Communication and Collaboration: CRM systems facilitate communication and collaboration among different departments within an organization, such as sales, marketing, customer service, and finance. By sharing customer information and interactions, teams can work together to provide a seamless and cohesive experience for customers.


Competitive Advantage: Providing exceptional customer experiences is essential for standing out from the competition. Companies that invest in CRM and focus on building strong relationships with their customers are more likely to retain customers, attract new ones, and outperform their competitors.


Developing skills in CRM can support the building of a career in several ways:


Specialization: As CRM becomes increasingly important for businesses, there is a growing demand for professionals with expertise in CRM systems and strategies. By developing skills in CRM, individuals can specialize in this field and pursue career opportunities in sales, marketing, customer service, or CRM consulting.


Career Advancement: Proficiency in CRM can open up opportunities for career advancement, as companies value employees who can effectively manage customer relationships and drive business growth. Individuals with strong CRM skills may be considered for leadership roles or higher-level positions within their organizations.


Flexibility: CRM skills are transferable across industries and sectors, allowing individuals to explore diverse career paths. Whether working in retail, finance, healthcare, or technology, professionals with CRM expertise can apply their skills to improve customer relationships and drive business success.


Entrepreneurship: For individuals interested in starting their own businesses or consulting practices, CRM skills can be highly valuable. By helping other companies implement CRM systems and strategies, entrepreneurs can build a successful career as CRM consultants or specialists.


In summary, learning about CRM is important for companies and managers because it enhances customer satisfaction, drives sales and marketing efforts, facilitates data-driven decision making, improves communication and collaboration, and provides a competitive advantage. Developing skills in CRM can support the building of a career by enabling specialization, career advancement, flexibility, and opportunities for entrepreneurship.
targetAudiences: Course will be interesting to anybody who want to know business cases and business environment of usage of CRM systems.

Companies that invest in CRM and focus on building strong relationships with their customers are more likely to retain customers, attract new ones, and outperform their competitors.

Developing skills in CRM can support the building of a career in several ways:  Specialization: As CRM becomes increasingly important for businesses, there is a growing demand for professionals with expertise in CRM systems and strategies. Career Advancement: Proficiency in CRM can open up opportunities for career advancement, as companies value employees who can effectively manage customer relationships and drive business growth. Individuals with strong CRM skills may be considered for leadership roles or higher-level positions within their organizations.  Flexibility: CRM skills are transferable across industries and sectors, allowing individuals to explore diverse career paths. Whether working in retail, finance, healthcare, or technology, professionals with CRM expertise can apply their skills to improve customer relationships and drive business success.  Entrepreneurship: For individuals interested in starting their own businesses or consulting practices, CRM skills can be highly valuable. By helping other companies implement CRM systems and strategies, entrepreneurs can build a successful career as CRM consultants or specialists.

In summary, learning about CRM is important for companies and managers because it enhances customer satisfaction, drives sales and marketing efforts, facilitates data-driven decision making, improves communication and collaboration, and provides a competitive advantage. THIS YELLOW BELT IS SELF-STUDY, 20 HOURS APPROX.

Earn your Lean Six Sigma White and Yellow Belt Certifications through OPEXLEADER, accredited by the Council for Six Sigma Certification (CSSC). It’s worth the effort, you’ll earn two international certifications. If you find it valuable, please leave us a great review to help more students discover this course through the Udemy algorithm!

WORLD-CLASS PROGRAMS AND INSTRUCTORS

Take your career to the next level as Operational Excellence Leader improving indicators and productivity in organizations.

OPEXLEADER is an accredited institute by the The Council for Six Sigma Certification CSSC which serves as an Official Industry Standard of Six Sigma Accreditation

We have more than 20 years of experience transforming organizations through continuous improvement

Continuous improvement can be implemented in products, processes and services, some benefits are:

- Business growth

- Increased productivity

- New value chains

- Eliminate Waste

- Motivation of the work team

Lean focuses more on the speed of processes; while Six Sigma focuses on increasing quality.

Six Sigma has its origins in the Six Sigma model developed by Motorola in the late 1980s. What was its purpose? The need to match or exceed its Japanese competitors. Bill Smith, the engineer responsible for its creation, developed this methodology as a quality improvement and business strategy and later improved and popularized it by General Electric.

Although the concept was born within the industrial sector, today many of its instruments are applied to the service sector. Thus, it is used throughout the world by companies seeking a philosophy of action to occupy leadership levels in their sector. Lean and Six Sigma share goals. Both propose to improve the management and processes of a company.

Get certified with us! OPEXLEADER

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & KI: Die ultimative künstliche intelligenz-schulung
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master KI und Prompt-Engineering: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Copilot, Gemini – Der umfassende Leitfaden zur generativen KI
courseDetails.longDescription:
Sind Sie bereit, jeden Tag mit einem außergewöhnlich talentierten persönlichen Assistenten zu beginnen, der Ihre Aufgaben mit unübertroffener Präzision und Geschwindigkeit erledigt? Eine KI, die Ihre E-Mails, Artikel oder Berichte verfasst, inspirierende Bilder erstellt, komplexe Daten analysiert, maßgeschneiderte Lösungen programmiert und eine Vielzahl von Problemen löst, sodass Sie sich auf das Wesentliche konzentrieren können.

Um all diese Vorteile der KI voll auszuschöpfen, müssen Sie jedoch lernen, sie richtig zu beherrschen. Viele Menschen sind anfangs begeistert, erstellen ein paar Eingabeaufforderungen und verlieren dann das Interesse, ohne das wahre Potenzial der künstlichen Intelligenz zu entdecken. Oft liegt dies an fehlenden Kenntnissen über die Techniken, Methoden und Einstellungen, die erforderlich sind, um optimale Ergebnisse mit der KI zu erzielen.

Ziel dieser Schulung ist es, Ihnen die Werkzeuge an die Hand zu geben, um effektiv mit der KI zu kommunizieren, sie optimal zu konfigurieren und ihr volles Potenzial auszuschöpfen.

Dazu habe ich einen prägnanten und dynamischen Kurs entwickelt, der Ihnen hilft, die wesentlichen Kenntnisse und Fähigkeiten für die optimale Nutzung der KI zu erwerben.

Im Verlauf dieser Schulung werden wir gemeinsam behandeln:

  • Wie Sie klare Anfragen an die KI formulieren, um die bestmöglichen Antworten zu erhalten.

  • Wie Sie ChatGPT so konfigurieren, dass es zu Ihrem Lehrer, Mitgründer oder vertrauenswürdigen Analysten wird.

  • Wie Sie mehrere Ideen generieren und Ihre Arbeit produktiver, schneller, relevanter und effizienter gestalten.

  • Wie Sie die Multimodalität von ChatGPT voll ausschöpfen, indem Sie ihm schreiben, mit ihm sprechen, ihm zuhören, ihm Bilder übermitteln und ihn bitten, diese zu interpretieren.

  • Wie Sie Dall-e oder Copilot dazu bringen, die besten Bilder zu erzeugen.

  • Wie Sie interessante Alternativen zur kostenpflichtigen Version von ChatGPT finden.

  • Wir werden auch andere KIs wie Copilot, Claude oder Gemini erkunden.

  • Wie Sie ChatGPT an Ihre spezifischen Vorlieben und Bedürfnisse anpassen können, um maßgeschneiderte Antworten zu erhalten.

  • Wie Sie ChatGPT mit GPTs erweitern können: wie man diese Anwendungen nutzt und sogar erstellt, ohne Entwickler zu sein.

  • Gegen Ende der Schulung werden wir einige technischere Themen behandeln, wie die Verwaltung von APIs, den Playground und die Integration von ChatGPT in andere Software wie Excel oder Google Sheets.

Und vor allem werden wir sehen, dass all dies für jedermann zugänglich ist, selbst für Anfänger.

In dieser Schulung finden Sie:

  • Konkrete Demonstrationen.

  • Technische Datenblätter und herunterladbare praktische Anleitungen.

[Aktualisierung: Ich habe Videos zur Nutzung des Modells GPT-4o hinzugefügt, das die Nachfolge von GPT-4 antritt.]

Kurz gesagt: Sie stehen kurz davor, an einem klar strukturierten, zugänglichen und ansprechenden Kurs teilzunehmen. Dieser Kurs bietet genügend Details, um die wesentlichen Konzepte abzudecken, ohne sich in unnötigen Längen zu verlieren. Unabhängig von Ihrem Einstiegsniveau, ob Sie Anfänger sind oder bereits fortgeschrittene Techniken suchen, dies ist die einzige Schulung, die Sie benötigen, um ChatGPT zu meistern.

Über mich:

Mein Name ist Yassine Rochd, und ich bin Gründer eines Schulungsunternehmens, das bereits Tausenden von Lernenden geholfen hat, ihre beruflichen Ziele zu erreichen.

Ich bin auch leidenschaftlich an Technologie interessiert. Nach einem Master-Abschluss in Finanzwesen und Erfahrungen in der Beratung sowie im Investmentfondsbereich, habe ich eine Ausbildung im Web-Development absolviert und Hunderte von Stunden damit verbracht, KI zu entdecken und zu nutzen.

Heute möchte ich Ihnen auf möglichst verständliche Weise das Wissen vermitteln, das ich in den letzten Jahren gesammelt habe.

Zertifizierung und Garantie:

Nach Abschluss dieses Kurses erhalten Sie ein Zertifikat, das Sie sogar auf LinkedIn teilen können.
Dieser Kurs ist zudem risikofrei, denn Sie haben eine 30-tägige „Zufriedenheitsgarantie“ mit Geld-zurück-Option.
Sie erhalten lebenslangen Zugang zum Kurs und zu den herunterladbaren Ressourcen.
Sie sind nur einen Klick davon entfernt, eine äußerst nützliche Technologie zu beherrschen, die Sie effizienter, produktiver und unverzichtbar macht.

Details zu den verschiedenen Kursabschnitten:

Schnelle Einführung in ChatGPT
Lernen Sie, wie Sie ChatGPT in nur wenigen Videos schnell beherrschen können. Tauchen Sie in die intuitive Benutzeroberfläche von ChatGPT ein und lernen Sie, Ihre ersten Prompts zu erstellen, um die volle Leistungsfähigkeit der KI auszuschöpfen. Egal, ob Sie Tabellen erstellen, brainstormen, Ideen generieren, Texte übersetzen und korrigieren oder vielfältige Inhalte verfassen möchten – mit dieser KI werden Sie schneller und leistungsfähiger. Entdecken Sie, wie ChatGPT Sie bei Ihrer Jobsuche unterstützen kann und sich an Ihre beruflichen Bedürfnisse anpasst, um Ihre Effizienz zu steigern. Sie werden sehen, dass ChatGPT in der Lage ist, eine Vielzahl von Inhalten zu erstellen, von E-Mails und Briefen bis hin zu Artikeln und Posts für soziale Netzwerke, ganz zu schweigen von der Erstellung von Programmiercode.

Grundlagen des Prompt Engineering
Erfahren Sie, warum das Prompt Engineering entscheidend ist und wie es ChatGPT in einen echten Experten verwandeln kann. Verstehen Sie die Bedeutung von Kontext und Zielen, um Ihre Interaktionen zu strukturieren, und lernen Sie, wie Sie das Format und die Parameter anpassen, um Ihre Prompts zu optimieren und das Kreativitätsniveau des Modells zu steuern. Personalisieren Sie Ihre Interaktionen, indem Sie den Ton und Stil beherrschen, und profitieren Sie von fünf praktischen Tipps, um noch relevantere Antworten von ChatGPT zu erhalten.
targetAudiences: Dieser Kurs richtet sich an alle, die KI und ChatGPT meistern möchten. Diese Schulung ist für jedes Niveau geeignet.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & AI : 인공지능 완벽 교육
courseDetails.shortDescription: AI 마스터 클래스 : ChatGPT, DALL-E, Claude, Gemini - 인공지능에 대한 완벽 가이드
courseDetails.longDescription:
ChatGPT & 생성형 AI 완벽 교육

매일 아침, 탁월한 능력을 지닌 개인 비서이자 동반자로서, 정확하고 신속하게 당신의 작업을 수행할 준비가 된 AI와 함께 하루를 시작할 준비가 되셨나요? 이메일 작성, 기사 작성, 보고서 작성, 영감을 주는 이미지 생성, 복잡한 데이터 분석, 맞춤형 솔루션 코딩 및 다양한 문제 해결을 통해 진정으로 중요한 일에 집중할 수 있도록 돕는 AI 말입니다.

이러한 혜택을 누리기 위해서는 AI를 제대로 이해하고 마스터해야 합니다. 많은 사람들이 인공지능에 관심을 갖고 몇 가지 프롬프트를 시도하지만, 결국 인공지능의 진정한 잠재력을 발견하지 못하고 포기하는 경우가 많습니다. 이러한 결과는 AI로부터 최상의 결과를 얻기 위한 기술, 방법, 설정에 대한 지식이 부족하기 때문입니다.

따라서 이 교육의 목적은 AI와 효과적으로 소통하고, 최적의 설정을 통해 AI를 최대한 활용할 수 있는 모든 열쇠를 제공하는 것입니다.

이를 위해 필수 지식과 기술을 개발할 수 있는 간결하고 역동적인 교육 과정을 설계했습니다.

이 과정에서 우리는 다음을 함께 배울 것입니다:

  • AI에게 명확한 요청을 하여 최상의 답변을 얻는 방법

  • ChatGPT를 신뢰할 수 있는 교사, 공동 창작자 또는 분석가로 설정하는 방법

  • 다수의 아이디어를 생성하고, 업무에서 더 나은 성과를 내며, 더 생산적이고 빠르고 효율적으로 일하는 방법

  • ChatGPT의 멀티모달 기능을 최대한 활용하여 텍스트 입력, 음성 대화, 이미지 전송 및 해석을 요청하는 방법

  • DALL-E나 Copilot을 통해 최상의 이미지를 생성하는 방법

  • ChatGPT의 유료 버전에 대한 흥미로운 대안을 찾는 방법

  • Copilot, Claude, Gemini와 같은 다른 AI를 탐색하는 방법

  • ChatGPT를 개인의 선호도와 필요에 맞게 조정하여 맞춤형 응답을 얻는 방법

  • GPTs로 ChatGPT를 향상시키는 방법: 이러한 애플리케이션을 사용하는 방법과 개발자가 아니더라도 이를 만드는 방법

  • 교육 후반부에서는 API 관리, Playground, Excel이나 Google Sheets와 같은 다른 소프트웨어에 ChatGPT를 통합하는 등 더 기술적인 주제를 다룰 것입니다.

그리고 초보자도 쉽게 접근할 수 있다는 점을 알게 될 것입니다.

이 교육 과정에는 다음이 포함됩니다:

  • 구체적인 시연

  • 다운로드 가능한 기술 자료 및 실용 가이드

  • 정기적으로 업데이트되는 콘텐츠


[업데이트: GPT-4의 후속 모델인 GPT-4o 사용법에 대한 영상을 추가했습니다]


간단히 말해, 명확하고 접근 가능하며 흥미로운 강의를 듣게 될 것입니다. 필수 개념을 다루기에 충분하면서도 길지 않은 강의입니다. 초보자든 고급 기술을 찾는 분이든 상관없이, ChatGPT를 마스터하기 위해 필요한 유일한 교육입니다.


제 소개:

제 이름은 야신 로슈드입니다. 저는 수천 명의 학습자가 그들의 직업적 목표를 달성할 수 있도록 돕는 교육 기관의 창립자입니다.

저는 기술에 열정을 가지고 있습니다. 금융학 석사 학위와 컨설팅 및 투자 펀드에서의 경험을 바탕으로, 웹 개발 교육을 받고 수백 시간을 들여 다양한 AI를 탐구하고 사용했습니다.

오늘, 제가 지난 몇 년 동안 배운 것을 최대한 명확하게 전달하고자 합니다.


인증 및 보장:

  • 이 교육을 완료하면 LinkedIn에 공유할 수 있는 인증서를 받게 됩니다.

  • 또한 이 교육 과정은 30일 환불 보장으로 안심하고 참여할 수 있습니다.


당신을 더 효율적이고, 더 생산적이며, 없어서는 안 될 기술로 무장하게 해 줄 기술을 마스터하기 위한 한 클릭이 남았습니다.


이 과정의 각 섹션 세부 사항


ChatGPT 빠른 시작
몇 개의 비디오만으로 ChatGPT를 신속하게 마스터하는 방법을 배워보세요. ChatGPT의 직관적인 인터페이스에 익숙해지고, 첫 프롬프트를 생성하여 AI의 강력한 기능을 최대한 활용하는 방법을 배워보세요. 표 생성, 브레인스토밍, 아이디어 창출, 텍스트 번역 및 수정, 다양한 콘텐츠 작성 등 ChatGPT와 함께라면 더 빠르고 효율적으로 작업할 수 있습니다. ChatGPT를 활용하여 구직 활동을 지원받고, 직업적 필요에 맞게 맞춤형으로 활용하여 효율성을 높이는 방법도 알아보세요. 이메일, 편지, 기사, 소셜 미디어 게시물, 그리고 코드 작성까지 다양한 콘텐츠를 생성할 수 있는 ChatGPT의 능력을 확인해보세요.


프롬프트 엔지니어링 기초
프롬프트 엔지니어링이 왜 중요한지, 그리고 어떻게 ChatGPT를 진정한 전문가로 변모시킬 수 있는지 배워보세요. 맥락과 목표의 중요성을 이해하고, 상호작용을 구조화하는 방법을 배우며, 프롬프트의 형식과 온도를 조절하여 모델의 창의성 수준을 최적화하는 방법을 알아보세요. 톤과 스타일을 마스터하여 상호작용을 개인화하고, ChatGPT로부터 더 적절한 답변을 얻기 위한 5가지 실용적인 팁을 제공합니다.


프롬프트 엔지니어링 고급 기술
이 섹션에서는 프롬프트를 생성하는 프롬프트를 만드는 방법을 배웁니다. 역공학 방법, 웹 검색 기능, 이미지 해석 기능 등 다양한 고급 기술을 학습합니다.


DALL-E
DALL-E를 사용하여 이미지 생성에 대해 알아보세요. 평균적인 결과에서 아름답고 영감을 주는 작품으로 전환하는 방법, 이미지의 일부를 간단하고 빠르게 수정하는 방법, 그리고 결과를 최적화하는 방법을 배웁니다. 또한, 소설이나 만화 캐릭터 생성에 연속성을 부여하여 더 인상적인 결과를 얻는 고급 기술도 다룹니다.


ChatGPT 및 AI의 한계 해결책
ChatGPT 및 기타 인공지능 모델은 한계와 약점을 가지고 있습니다. 이 섹션에서는 이러한 한계가 무엇인지, 그리고 이를 어떻게 극복할 수 있는지 알아봅니다.


ChatGPT의 흥미로운 기능
ChatGPT를 협업용으로 사용하기 위해 대화 공유 기능을 설정하는 방법을 배웁니다. ChatGPT 모바일 애플리케이션의 모든 옵션을 탐색하여 최대한 활용하는 방법을 배우고, AI를 통해 플래그 없이 독창적인 콘텐츠를 만드는 방법도 알아봅니다.


Copilot 및 Bing
Copilot은 ChatGPT의 유료 고급 기능에 대한 여러 가지 흥미로운 대안을 제공합니다. Microsoft와 OpenAI의 파트너십을 활용하여 Bing 검색 엔진에 통합된 고급 인공지능 기능을 사용하는 방법을 배워보세요.


Gemini, Claude, Mistral 등
이전 섹션의 연장선으로, Google의 Gemini 또는 Anthropic의 Claude와 같은 다른 AI를 살펴봅니다. 이들의 강점과 약점을 파악하고, 어떤 상황에서 ChatGPT 대신 사용하는 것이 더 나은지 알아보세요.


ChatGPT 커스텀 설정
ChatGPT를 필요와 기대에 맞게 조정하세요. 커스텀 설정을 구성하여 상호작용을 개인화하는 방법을 배우고, 최적의 사용을 위해 고려해야 할 주의사항을 알아봅니다.


GPTs
GPTs의 작동 방식을 배우고, 때로는 ChatGPT를 능가할 수 있는 이 초특화된 미니 애플리케이션을 알아보세요. 단계별로 자신의 GPT를 만드는 방법을 배우고, ChatGPT의 기능을 극대화하기 위해 API 호출을 마스터하세요. 또한, 이 섹션의 마지막에서는 GPT를 통해 수익을 창출하는 방법과 더 넓게는 ChatGPT로 돈을 버는 방법을 탐구합니다.


API 관리 및 Playground
ChatGPT의 Playground를 탐색하고 제공되는 새로운 기능을 알아보세요. 단계별로 ChatGPT의 API를 호출하는 방법을 배워, 인터페이스 외부에서 ChatGPT를 사용하거나, 다른 사이트에 챗봇을 만들거나, Google Sheets 또는 Excel과 같은 소프트웨어에 ChatGPT를 통합할 수 있습니다.
targetAudiences: 인공지능과 ChatGPT를 마스터하고자 하는 모든 분들을 위한 과정입니다. 이 교육은 모든 수준에 적합합니다.

Welcome to course: Professional Diploma in WEB3 NFT and NFT Smart Contracts Development by MTF Institute and QuickNode


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


QuickNode

QuickNode simplifies blockchain infrastructure for teams big & small. A lightning-fast global API provides access to 22+ blockchains and 35+ networks. Plus high-leverage tools (NFT/Token API, Graph API, QuickAlerts, Marketplace, etc...) and expert support to evolve, enhance, and push the boundaries of your app. A comprehensive blockchain developer platform, trusted by top Web3 projects & businesses. QuickNode is helping the blockchain ecosystem grow since 2017


Web3 refers to the next generation of the internet, often referred to as the decentralized web. It is envisioned as a more transparent, secure, and user-centric version of the internet, enabled by blockchain technology and decentralized protocols. In Web3, users have more control over their data and digital identities, and intermediaries such as centralized platforms are minimized or eliminated. This decentralized architecture offers various benefits such as increased privacy, censorship resistance, and the ability to create trustless interactions through smart contracts.


NFT stands for Non-Fungible Token. NFTs are unique digital assets that represent ownership or proof of authenticity of a particular item or piece of content, typically stored on a blockchain. Unlike cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin or Ethereum, which are fungible and can be exchanged on a one-to-one basis, NFTs are indivisible and cannot be exchanged on a like-for-like basis due to their unique attributes. NFTs have gained significant attention in recent years, especially in the realms of digital art, collectibles, gaming, and virtual real estate, as they provide a way to establish scarcity and ownership in the digital world.


Learning about Web3 and NFTs is important for companies and managers for several reasons:


Understanding Emerging Technologies: Web3 and NFTs represent significant shifts in how we interact with the internet and digital assets. By staying informed about these technologies, companies and managers can anticipate trends and adapt their strategies accordingly.


New Business Opportunities: Web3 and NFTs open up new avenues for innovation and revenue generation. Companies that embrace these technologies can explore novel business models, such as decentralized finance (DeFi), tokenized assets, and digital collectibles.


Enhanced Customer Engagement: NFTs enable unique and personalized experiences for customers, whether through digital art, exclusive content, or virtual goods. By leveraging NFTs, companies can deepen customer engagement and foster a sense of community around their brand.


Mitigating Risks: As blockchain technology becomes more prevalent, understanding its implications becomes crucial for risk management. Companies need to grasp the security and regulatory considerations associated with Web3 and NFTs to protect their assets and reputation.


Developing skills in Web3 and NFTs can support career advancement or the launch of a business in several ways:


Technical Proficiency: Learning blockchain development, smart contract programming, and NFT standards (such as ERC-721 or ERC-1155) can open up opportunities for technical roles in blockchain-focused companies or projects.


Entrepreneurial Ventures: Individuals with expertise in Web3 and NFTs can capitalize on the growing demand for blockchain-based solutions by starting their own businesses. This could involve creating NFT marketplaces, developing blockchain games, or providing consultancy services to companies exploring blockchain integration.


Strategic Leadership: Managers who understand the potential of Web3 and NFTs can drive innovation within their organizations and guide strategic decisions related to blockchain adoption. This may involve identifying use cases, forming partnerships with blockchain startups, or implementing pilot projects to test new ideas.


Personal Branding: Building a reputation as a thought leader or expert in Web3 and NFTs can enhance career prospects and attract opportunities for speaking engagements, advisory roles, or partnerships.


In conclusion, learning about Web3 and NFTs is essential for companies and managers to stay competitive in a rapidly evolving digital landscape. By embracing these technologies and developing relevant skills, individuals can position themselves for career growth and entrepreneurial success in the blockchain industry.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & IA: Formação Completa em Inteligência Artificial
courseDetails.shortDescription: Domine o ChatGPT, IA e a Engenharia de Prompt: Chat GPT, Dall-e, Copilot | O curso essencial de inteligência artificial
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formação Completa ChatGPT & IAs Generativas

Você está pronto para começar cada dia com um aliado, um assistente pessoal extremamente talentoso, pronto para realizar suas tarefas com precisão e rapidez incomparáveis?

Uma IA capaz de redigir seus e-mails, artigos ou relatórios, criar imagens inspiradoras, analisar dados complexos, programar soluções sob medida e resolver uma infinidade de problemas, permitindo que você se concentre no que realmente importa.

Para aproveitar todos esses benefícios da IA, é essencial dominá-la. Muitas pessoas se empolgam, fazem 2 ou 3 prompts e acabam abandonando o assunto sem descobrir o verdadeiro potencial da inteligência artificial. Esse comportamento muitas vezes revela um desconhecimento das técnicas, métodos e configurações que permitem obter os melhores resultados com a IA.

O objetivo desta formação é fornecer todas as chaves para comunicar eficazmente com a IA, configurá-la da melhor forma e aproveitá-la ao máximo.

Para alcançar isso, concebi um percurso conciso e dinâmico que permitirá a você desenvolver os conhecimentos e competências essenciais para a utilização otimizada da IA.

Durante esta formação, veremos juntos:

  • Como formular requisições claras para a IA para obter as melhores respostas possíveis.

  • Como configurar o ChatGPT para que ele se torne seu professor, co-fundador ou analista de confiança.

  • Como gerar múltiplas ideias e se tornar melhor no seu trabalho, mais produtivo, rápido, relevante e eficiente.

  • Como aproveitar ao máximo a multimodalidade do ChatGPT para escrever, falar, ouvir, transmitir imagens e pedir que ele as interprete.

  • Como fazer o Dall-e ou o Copilot gerar as melhores imagens possíveis.

  • Como encontrar alternativas interessantes para a versão paga do ChatGPT.

  • Exploraremos outras IAs como Copilot, Claude e Gemini.

  • Veremos como adaptar o ChatGPT às suas preferências e necessidades específicas para respostas personalizadas.

  • Vamos descobrir como potencializar o ChatGPT com os GPTs: como usar essas aplicações e até mesmo como criá-las sem ser um desenvolvedor.

  • Exploraremos tópicos mais técnicos no final da formação, como gerenciamento de API, playground, integração do ChatGPT com outros softwares como Excel ou Google Sheets, por exemplo.

  • E, sobretudo, veremos que tudo isso é acessível a todos, mesmo aos iniciantes.

Nesta formação, você encontrará:

  • Demonstrações concretas.

  • Fichas técnicas e guias práticos para download.

[Atualização: Adicionei vídeos sobre o uso do modelo GPT-4o, que sucede a versão GPT-4]

Em resumo, você está prestes a seguir um curso claro, acessível e envolvente. Detalhado o suficiente para cobrir os conceitos essenciais sem se prolongar demais. Não importa o seu nível de partida, seja você iniciante ou esteja em busca de técnicas avançadas, esta é a única formação que você precisará para dominar o ChatGPT.

Minha apresentação:

Meu nome é Yassine Rochd, sou fundador de uma organização de treinamento que ajudou milhares de aprendizes a alcançar seus objetivos profissionais. Sou também apaixonado por tecnologia. Após um mestrado em finanças e experiências em consultoria e fundos de investimento, fiz uma formação em desenvolvimento web e passei centenas de horas descobrindo e utilizando IAs. Hoje, desejo transmitir de forma clara o que aprendi nos últimos anos.

Certificação e Garantia:

  • Ao concluir esta formação, você receberá uma certificação que poderá compartilhar até mesmo no LinkedIn.

  • Esta formação é também sem riscos, pois você tem uma garantia de "satisfação ou reembolso" de 30 dias.

  • Você terá acesso vitalício à formação e aos recursos para download.

Você está a um clique de dominar uma tecnologia extremamente útil que tornará você mais eficiente, mais produtivo e simplesmente indispensável.


Detalhamento das Diferentes Seções deste Curso

Introdução Rápida ao ChatGPT

Descubra como dominar rapidamente o ChatGPT em apenas alguns vídeos. Mergulhe na interface intuitiva do ChatGPT e aprenda a criar seus primeiros prompts para aproveitar ao máximo o poder da IA. Seja para gerar tabelas, fazer brainstorming, gerar ideias, traduzir e corrigir textos, ou até redigir diversos conteúdos, você será mais rápido e eficiente com a IA. Descubra como o ChatGPT pode ajudá-lo na sua busca de emprego e se adaptar às suas necessidades profissionais para aumentar sua eficiência. Você verá que o ChatGPT é capaz de criar uma variedade de conteúdos, desde e-mails e cartas até artigos e postagens para redes sociais, sem esquecer a redação de códigos de programação.

Fundamentos do Prompt Engineering

Aprenda por que o prompt engineering é essencial e como ele pode transformar o ChatGPT em um verdadeiro especialista. Compreenda a importância do contexto e dos objetivos para estruturar suas interações, e descubra como ajustar o formato e a temperatura para otimizar seus prompts e variar o nível de criatividade do modelo. Personalize suas interações dominando o tom e o estilo, e aproveite 5 dicas práticas para obter respostas ainda mais pertinentes do ChatGPT.

Técnicas Avançadas de Prompt Engineering

Nesta seção, veremos como criar prompts que geram outros prompts. Estudaremos o método de reverse engineering, funcionalidades de busca na web, interpretação de imagens e muitas outras técnicas avançadas.

Dall-e

Em seguida, abordaremos a geração de imagens com Dall-e. Você verá como passar de um resultado mediano a obras estéticas e inspiradoras, como modificar de forma simples e rápida partes de imagens e otimizar seus resultados. Também estudaremos técnicas avançadas que permitirão, por exemplo, criar uma continuidade na geração de um personagem de ficção ou quadrinhos, para resultados ainda mais impressionantes.

Soluções para as Limitações do ChatGPT e da IA

ChatGPT e outros modelos de inteligência artificial apresentam limitações e fraquezas. Nesta seção, veremos quais são essas limitações e como superá-las.

Funcionalidades Interessantes do ChatGPT

Aprenda a configurar as funcionalidades de compartilhamento de suas conversas para uma utilização colaborativa do ChatGPT. Aproveite ao máximo o aplicativo móvel do ChatGPT, explorando todas as opções que ele oferece. Por fim, descubra métodos para criar conteúdo único com a IA, evitando qualquer forma de plágio ou conteúdo duplicado.

Copilot e Bing

O Copilot oferece várias alternativas interessantes para funcionalidades pagas e avançadas do ChatGPT. Veremos como aproveitar a parceria entre a Microsoft e a OpenAI para acessar funcionalidades avançadas de inteligência artificial integradas ao motor de busca Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral e Outros

Dando continuidade à seção anterior, estudaremos outras IAs, como o Gemini do Google e o Claude da Anthropic. Veremos suas forças, fraquezas e analisaremos vários casos de uso para saber em quais situações preferi-las ao ChatGPT.

Custom Instructions no ChatGPT

Adapte o ChatGPT às suas necessidades e expectativas. Aprenda a personalizar suas interações configurando suas custom instructions. Descubra também os pontos de atenção para uma utilização ótima.

Os GPTs

Descubra como funcionam os GPTs, essas miniaplicações hiperespecializadas que podem, às vezes, superar o ChatGPT. Aprenda a criar seu próprio GPT passo a passo. courseDetails.title: ChatGPT ve Yapay Zeka: kapsamlı yapay zeka eğitimi
courseDetails.shortDescription: Yapay Zekayı Öğrenin: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini - yapay zeka hakkında kapsamlı rehber
courseDetails.longDescription:
ChatGPT ve Yapay Zeka Eğitimi:

Her güne, görevlerinizi benzersiz bir hız ve hassasiyetle yerine getirebilecek son derece yetenekli bir kişisel asistanla başlamak ister misiniz? E-postalarınızı, makalelerinizi veya raporlarınızı yazabilen, ilham verici görseller üretebilen, karmaşık verileri analiz edebilen, özel çözümler kodlayabilen ve çeşitli sorunları çözebilen bir yapay zeka ile çalışarak, gerçekten önemli olan konulara odaklanabilirsiniz.

Ancak, bu avantajlardan tam anlamıyla yararlanabilmek için yapay zekayı derinlemesine anlamak önemlidir. Pek çok kişi birkaç komut verip, yapay zekanın gerçek potansiyelini keşfetmeden süreci yarıda bırakıyor. Bunun arkasında genellikle, yapay zekadan en iyi sonuçları almanızı sağlayacak teknikler, yöntemler ve ince ayarlar hakkında bilgi eksikliği bulunur.

Bu eğitimin amacı, yapay zeka ile etkili bir şekilde iletişim kurabilmeniz, onu en iyi şekilde yapılandırmanız ve tam potansiyelinden faydalanmanız için size gerekli tüm araçları sunmaktır.

Bu hedefe ulaşmak için, yapay zekayı optimize ederek kullanmanız gereken temel bilgi ve becerileri kazanmanızı sağlayacak kapsamlı ve dinamik bir eğitim hazırladım.

Bu eğitim süresince birlikte şunları öğreneceğiz:

  • En iyi sonuçları almak için yapay zekaya nasıl net sorular sorulur.

  • ChatGPT'yi güvenilir öğretmeniniz, iş ortağınız veya analiz uzmanınız haline getirecek şekilde nasıl yapılandırılır.

  • Çalışmalarınızda daha üretken, hızlı, anlamlı ve etkili olmak için nasıl çeşitli fikirler üretebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'nin çok yönlü kullanımından tam olarak faydalanmak için ona nasıl yazılır, nasıl konuşulur, nasıl dinlenir, ona görseller nasıl gönderilir ve nasıl yorumlanması istenir.

  • Dall-e veya Copilot'u en iyi görselleri üretmeleri için nasıl yönlendirebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'nin ücretli sürümüne alternatif olarak hangi ilginç seçenekleri değerlendirebilirsiniz.

  • Copilot, Claude veya Gemini gibi diğer yapay zeka araçlarını da keşfedeceğiz.

  • ChatGPT'yi özel ihtiyaçlarınıza ve tercihinize göre nasıl özelleştirebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'yi GPT’lerle nasıl güçlendirebileceğimizi göreceğiz: Bu uygulamaları nasıl kullanacağınızı ve hatta geliştirici olmadan nasıl oluşturabileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.

  • Eğitimin sonunda, API yönetimi, Playground, ChatGPT’nin Excel veya Google Sheets gibi yazılımlara entegrasyonu gibi daha teknik konuları da ele alacağız.

  • Ve en önemlisi, tüm bunların başlangıç seviyesindeki kişiler için bile erişilebilir olduğunu göreceğiz.

Bu eğitimde şunları bulacaksınız:

  • Pratik ve somut gösterimler.

  • İndirilebilir teknik bilgiler ve pratik kılavuzlar.

[Güncelleme: GPT-4'ün yerini alan GPT-4o modelinin kullanımına dair videolar ekledim]

Kısacası, açık, erişilebilir ve ilgi çekici bir kursa başlamak üzeresiniz. Gerekli kavramları detaylı bir şekilde ele alan, ancak gereksiz uzunluğa kaçmayan bu eğitim, ChatGPT'yi tam anlamıyla öğrenmeniz için ihtiyacınız olan tek kaynak olacak. Başlangıç seviyeniz ne olursa olsun, ister yeni başlıyor olun ister ileri düzey teknikler arıyor olun, bu kurs size hitap edecek.


Tanıtımım:

Adım Yassine Rochd, binlerce öğrencinin profesyonel hedeflerine ulaşmasına yardımcı olan bir eğitim kuruluşunun kurucusuyum.

Teknolojiye büyük bir tutku duyuyorum. Finans alanında yüksek lisans yaptıktan ve danışmanlık ile yatırım fonları alanında deneyim kazandıktan sonra, web geliştirme konusunda eğitim aldım ve yüzlerce saatimi yapay zekayı keşfetmeye ve kullanmaya adadım.

Bugün, son birkaç yılda öğrendiklerimi size en anlaşılır şekilde aktarmayı hedefliyorum.


Sertifikasyon ve Garanti:

  • Bu eğitimi tamamladığınızda, LinkedIn'de bile paylaşabileceğiniz bir sertifika alacaksınız.

  • Eğitimimiz risksizdir; çünkü 30 günlük "memnuniyet garantisi" sunuyoruz.

  • Ayrıca, eğitime ve indirilebilir kaynaklara ömür boyu erişim hakkınız olacak.

Sizi daha etkili, daha üretken ve vazgeçilmez kılacak bu son derece faydalı teknolojiyi öğrenmek için sadece bir tık uzaktasınız.


Kursun Bölüm Detayları:

ChatGPT'ye Hızlı Başlangıç:

ChatGPT'yi yalnızca birkaç video ile hızla öğrenin. ChatGPT'nin sezgisel arayüzüne adım atın ve yapay zekanın gücünü tam anlamıyla kullanabilmek için ilk komutlarınızı nasıl oluşturacağınızı öğrenin. Tablo oluşturmadan beyin fırtınasına, fikir üretmeden metin çevirisi ve düzeltmeye kadar çeşitli içerikler oluşturmak için ChatGPT ile daha hızlı ve verimli olacaksınız. ChatGPT'nin iş arayışınızda size nasıl yardımcı olabileceğini ve profesyonel ihtiyaçlarınıza uyum sağlayarak verimliliğinizi nasıl artırabileceğini keşfedin. ChatGPT'nin e-postalar ve mektuplardan makalelere ve sosyal medya paylaşımlarına, hatta yazılım kodlamasına kadar birçok içerik oluşturma yeteneğine sahip olduğunu göreceksiniz.


Prompt Engineering'in Temelleri

Prompt engineering'in önemini ve ChatGPT'yi gerçek bir uzmana dönüştürme yöntemlerini keşfedin. Etkileşimlerinizi yapılandırmak için bağlamın ve hedeflerin rolünü anlayın; en iyi sonuçları elde etmek için format ve sıcaklık ayarlarını nasıl optimize edeceğinizi öğrenin. Ton ve stil kontrolü ile etkileşimlerinizi kişiselleştirin ve ChatGPT'den daha alakalı yanıtlar alabilmeniz için 5 pratik ipucunu uygulayın.


İleri Düzey Prompt Engineering Teknikleri

Bu bölümde, kendi kendine yeni promptlar üretebilen promptlar oluşturmayı öğreneceğiz. Reverse engineering (tersine mühendislik), web arama işlevleri, görüntü yorumlama teknikleri ve diğer birçok ileri düzey tekniği derinlemesine inceleyeceğiz.


Dall-e

Dall-e ile görsel oluşturma sürecine adım atacağız. Orta düzeydeki bir sonuçtan estetik ve ilham verici eserlere nasıl geçiş yapabileceğinizi, görüntülerin belirli bölümlerini basit ve hızlı bir şekilde nasıl değiştirebileceğinizi ve sonuçlarınızı nasıl optimize edebileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz. Ayrıca, bir çizgi roman ya da kurgusal karakterin sürekliliğini yaratmanıza olanak tanıyan ileri düzey teknikleri inceleyerek daha etkileyici sonuçlar elde edebileceksiniz.


ChatGPT ve Yapay Zekanın Sınırlarına Çözümler

ChatGPT ve diğer yapay zeka modellerinin belirli sınırlamaları ve zayıflıkları vardır. Bu bölümde, bu sınırlamaların neler olduğunu ve bunları nasıl aşabileceğinizi inceleyeceğiz.


ChatGPT'deki İlginç Özellikler

ChatGPT'yi işbirlikçi bir şekilde kullanabilmek için sohbetlerinizi paylaşma özelliklerini nasıl yapılandıracağınızı öğrenin. ChatGPT mobil uygulamasını en iyi şekilde kullanmak için sunduğu tüm seçenekleri keşfedin. Son olarak, yapay zeka ile benzersiz içerikler oluşturmanın ve her türlü intihal veya kopya içerikten kaçınmanın yollarını öğreneceksiniz.


Copilot ve Bing

Copilot, ChatGPT'nin ücretli ve gelişmiş özelliklerine birkaç ilginç alternatif sunar. Microsoft ve OpenAI iş birliği sayesinde, Bing arama motoruna entegre edilmiş ileri düzey yapay zeka özelliklerine nasıl erişebileceğinizi inceleyeceğiz.


Gemini, Claude, Mistral ve Diğerleri

Bir önceki bölümün devamı olarak, Google'ın Gemini'si veya Anthropic'in Claude'u gibi diğer yapay zeka modellerini inceleyeceğiz. Bu modellerin güçlü ve zayıf yönlerini değerlendirerek, hangi durumlarda ChatGPT yerine tercih edilebileceklerini göreceğiz.


ChatGPT Özel Talimatları (Custom Instructions)

ChatGPT'yi ihtiyaçlarınıza ve beklentilerinize göre nasıl özelleştireceğinizi öğrenin. Özel talimatlarınızı yapılandırarak etkileşimlerinizi nasıl kişiselleştirebileceğinizi keşfedin ve optimum kullanım için göz önünde bulundurmanız gereken önemli noktaları öğrenin.


GPT'ler

Bazı durumlarda ChatGPT'yi bile geride bırakabilen, son derece uzmanlaşmış mini uygulamalar olan GPT'lerin nasıl çalıştığını keşfedin. Kendi GPT'nizi adım adım nasıl oluşturacağınızı öğrenin. ChatGPT'nin yeteneklerini en üst düzeye çıkarmak için API çağrılarını nasıl yöneteceğinizi öğrenecek ve bölümün sonunda GPT'lerinizi nasıl paraya çevirebileceğinizi ve genel olarak ChatGPT ile nasıl gelir elde edebileceğinizi keşfedeceksiniz.


API Yönetimi ve Playground

ChatGPT'nin Playground'unu keşfedin ve sunduğu yeni özellikleri öğrenin. Artan zorluk seviyelerinde ChatGPT API'sine nasıl çağrı yapacağınızı öğrenin. Böylece ChatGPT'yi arayüz dışında kullanabilir, başka bir siteye chatbot yerleştirebilir veya ChatGPT'yi Google Sheets veya Excel gibi diğer yazılımlara entegre edebilirsiniz.
targetAudiences: Yapay zeka ve ChatGPT'yi öğrenmek isteyen herkes için, seviyeniz ne olursa olsun.

courseDetails.title: Complete Video Editing BootCamp Beginner to Advanced
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Video Editing With Adobe Premire Pro, After Effect, Filmora, Davinci Resolve
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the Video Editing Bootcamp! In this intensive course, we will dive deep into the world of video editing, focusing on four powerful software tools: Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Filmora, and DaVinci Resolve. Whether you're a beginner or an aspiring professional, this bootcamp will equip you with the skills and knowledge needed to bring your video projects to life.


During this course, we will explore the fundamental concepts of video editing, covering everything from importing and organizing footage to advanced editing techniques. We'll also delve into the art of storytelling through video and discuss the importance of pacing, rhythm, and visual aesthetics.


Our primary software tool will be Adobe Premiere Pro, a versatile and widely used editing software. You will learn how to navigate the interface, perform basic edits, add transitions and effects, and polish your videos for a professional look.


Additionally, we will explore Adobe After Effects, a powerful motion graphics and visual effects software. You'll discover how to create stunning title sequences, add dynamic animations, and enhance your videos with visual effects to make them truly captivating.


Filmora will also be a part of our curriculum, offering a user-friendly interface and a range of creative features. You'll learn how to utilize Filmora's intuitive tools to edit videos efficiently, apply filters and overlays, and add music and sound effects to enhance the overall impact.


Finally, we'll explore DaVinci Resolve, a robust software known for its professional color grading capabilities. You'll discover how to balance colors, create unique looks, and achieve the desired mood and atmosphere in your videos.


Throughout the bootcamp, you will engage in hands-on exercises and projects to apply the skills you learn. You'll receive personalized feedback and guidance from our experienced instructors, helping you refine your editing techniques and develop your own unique style.


By the end of this Video Editing Bootcamp, you will have a comprehensive understanding of these industry-leading software tools and be ready to tackle a wide range of video editing projects. Get ready to unleash your creativity, master the art of storytelling, and take your videos to the next level!

courseDetails.title: Six Sigma: Lean Six Sigma White Belt (Accredited)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Achieve your Lean Six Sigma White Belt Certification (CSSC Accredited). Embark on your Lean Six Sigma Journey with us.
courseDetails.longDescription:
WORLD-CLASS PROGRAMS AND INSTRUCTORS

Take your career to the next level as Operational Excellence Leader improving indicators and productivity in organizations.

OPEXLEADER is an accredited institute by the The Council for Six Sigma Certification CSSC which serves as an Official Industry Standard of Six Sigma Accreditation

We have more than 20 years of experience transforming organizations through continuous improvement

Continuous improvement can be implemented in products, processes and services, some benefits are:

- Business growth

- Increased productivity

- New value chains

- Eliminate Waste

- Motivation of the work team

Lean focuses more on the speed of processes; while Six Sigma focuses on increasing quality.

Six Sigma has its origins in the Six Sigma model developed by Motorola in the late 1980s. What was its purpose? The need to match or exceed its Japanese competitors. Bill Smith, the engineer responsible for its creation, developed this methodology as a quality improvement and business strategy and later improved and popularized it by General Electric.

Although the concept was born within the industrial sector, today many of its instruments are applied to the service sector. Thus, it is used throughout the world by companies seeking a philosophy of action to occupy leadership levels in their sector. Lean and Six Sigma share goals. Both propose to improve the management and processes of a company.

Get certified with us! OPEXLEADER
targetAudiences: Anyone Interested in Process Improvement: Individuals who have an interest in process improvement and want to learn the fundamentals of Lean Six Sigma.

Employees at All Levels: Employees from all levels of an organization, from entry-level to senior management, can benefit from the White Belt course. It provides a foundational understanding of Lean Six Sigma and continuous improvement concepts.
Managers and Supervisors: Managers and supervisors who want to understand Lean Six Sigma principles and how they can be applied to improve processes and operations in their departments.

Team Members: Individuals who are part of cross-functional teams or project teams working on process improvement initiatives can gain valuable insights and terminology to facilitate their participation in Lean Six Sigma projects.
